item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (292 points | 78 comments)
2. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (346 points | 75 comments)
3. Malware found on NPM infecting local package with reverse shell (134 points | 76 comments)
4. A love letter to the CSV format (233 points | 244 comments)
5. Playwright Tools for MCP (88 points | 14 comments)
6. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (163 points | 70 comments)
7. Problems with the heap (50 points | 13 comments)
8. Botswana Successfully Launches First Satellite, Botsat-1 (129 points | 39 comments)
9. MCP server for Ghidra (156 points | 20 comments)
10. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (82 points | 14 comments)
11. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (20 points | 1 comment)
12. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (10 points | 1 comment)
13. Writing Programs with Ncurses (35 points | 7 comments)
14. Gemma3 Function Calling (75 points | 10 comments)
15. Sharding Pgvector (50 points | 7 comments)
16. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding product engineer ( | hide)
17. How to Delete Your 23andMe Data (83 points | 24 comments)
18. A glitch in an online survey replaced the word 'yes' with 'forks' (100 points | 46 comments)
19. Google will develop Android OS behind closed doors starting next week (177 points | 116 comments)
20. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (11 points | 6 comments)
21. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (4 points | discuss)
22. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (94 points | 57 comments)
23. Kilo Code: Speedrunning open source coding AI (62 points | 41 comments)
24. Heap-overflowing Llama.cpp to RCE (215 points | 46 comments)
25. Collapse OS (107 points | 75 comments)
26. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (82 points | 81 comments)
27. Google makes Android development private, will continue open source releases (76 points | 27 comments)
28. Tao: Using test-time compute to train efficient LLMs without labeled data (10 points | discuss)
29. Google’s two-year frenzy to catch up with OpenAI (134 points | 155 comments)
30. An Interview with Zen Chief Architect Mike Clark (108 points | 7 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
